c2effect.name: Circles
c2effect.description: Concentric circles with eyelid effect (increase the distance parameter to see the eyelid)
c2effect.author: GamesWarp Studio

param.name: Circle X-Coord
param.description: X coord of mouse point. Use Mouse.X for circles dependent on mouse location

param.name: Circle Y-Coord
param.description: Y coord of mouse point. Use LayoutHeight - Mouse.Y for circles dependent on mouse location. The Y-Axis is currently reversed in C2.

param.name: Distance between Circles
param.description: Distance between Circles. Range -50 to 50 for best effect; 0 disables effect

param.name: Zoom factor
param.description: Zoom factor for effect. Range -50 to 50 for best effect
